name: Saules aveugles, femme endormie
summary: An adaptation of six short stories by the famous Japanese author Haruki Murakami transformed into a single narrative directed and written by French artist Pierre Foldes.
info:
• 中文名: 盲柳与睡女
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
  • 上映年度: 2022年6月15日
  • 片长: 100min
